meanings.sent1: The coprosperity of the two companies led to a successful partnership.
meanings.sent2: The community worked together to achieve coprosperity for all its members.
meanings.sent3: The coprosperity of the siblings in their lemonade stand business brought them closer.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the flowers and bees shared a coprosperity that was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The coprosperity of the team was evident in their shared joy and accomplishments.

meanings.definition: The state of being prosperous together.
meanings.sent1: The coprosperity of the neighborhood was evident in the well-maintained gardens.
meanings.sent2: The coprosperity of the family business ensured stability for generations.
meanings.sent3: The coprosperity of the friends in their baking venture made for delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: The coprosperity of the forest animals and plants created a harmonious ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The coprosperity of the community was celebrated with a festival of togetherness.
